page.title: 17SOCIAL SURVEY 1
page.content: 1The survey was based on a sample of 34 households in the village of{Defford. {RESULTS} { 65%}of houses were owner-occupied { 35%}were owned by the local council The average number of persons per house was{3. Age structure was as follows:- {Under 5 8%} {5 - 16 19% {17 - 30 7% {31 - 60 46% {Over 60 20%} There was an unusually high retired population, this was reflected in the {recreational activities}described with{gardening (34%), watching T.V. {(21%), and reading (16%)}the most popular. Few, if any went outside the village for recreation.
